title: Bitcoin ETF market thrives with nearly 9,300 Bitcoin added in one day
description:
Quick Take Bitcoin ETFs notched an impressive day with a strong inflow of $477 million (roughly 9,300 BTC,) according to BitMEX Research. BitMEX data shows that BlackRock’s IBIT stood out on Feb. 15, seeing a $331 million inflow that bolstered its cumulative total to a staggering $5.2 billion. Fidelity’s FBTC, while registering a substantial $97 […]

The post Bitcoin ETF market thrives with nearly 9,300 Bitcoin added in one day appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: AI Revolutionizes E-commerce: Personalization, Prediction, and Transformation
description: In the rapidly evolving world of e-commerce, artificial intelligence (AI) is spearheading a transformation that promises to redefine the retail landscape. With advancements in technology, AI is no longer a futuristic concept but a present reality, enhancing online shopping experiences through personalization, dynamic pricing, and predictive analytics. title: AI Hedge Funds Look Beyond Silicon Valley, Aiming to Unearth Next Nvidia
description: Hedge funds specializing in artificial intelligence (AI) investments are eyeing potential winners akin to industry titan Nvidia, as they seek to capitalize on the burgeoning AI market.  These funds are strategically placing their bets on companies demonstrating strong AI capabilities and disruptive potential. title: Firm handling FTX’s bankruptcy set to be appointed as Binance’s watchdog
description: New York-based law firm Sullivan & Cromwell may be appointed as an independent monitor for Binance Holdings Ltd. According to a Bloomberg report, Sullivan & Cromwell is the leading contender for the coveted observer position, likely beating out a crowded…

title: BTC and ETH safe from 51% attacks, Coin Metrics cites using cost barriers
description: Crypto intelligence firm Coin Metrics has revealed in its latest research that it has become impractical for nation-states to dismantle the BTC and ETH network through 51% attacks, given the prohibitive expenses involved. A 51% attack involves gaining majority control…
